caption.p: (a) The fatty acid distribution of Handal ( Citrullus Colocynthis) seeds oil cultivated in Jordan and (b) The distribution of fatty acid subclasses in the oil. SFA = Saturated fatty acids, MUFA = monounsaturated fatty acids, n6‐PUFA = omega 6 polyunsaturated fatty acids, n3‐PUFA = omega 3 polyunsaturated fatty acids, OH‐PUFA = polyunsaturated hydroxy fatty acids. Values represent means, and four replicates were done for each treatment
